1. Florida Panthers Agree to Terms with Forward Brad Marchand on a Six-Year Contract Extension  NHL.com
  2. Marchand signs 6-year, $31.5 million contract with Panthers  NHL.com
  3. Sources: Panthers keeping Marchand, Ekblad  ESPN
  4. Red Wings would love to land one of these three free-agent D  MLive.com
  5. Panthers found a way to keep the core together, and Zito says it was player-driven  Yahoo
